description: This table contains audit information on changes to admission reservations. Each row represents a change to the related encounter's reservation.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: RES_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: RES_HX_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Reason for Change category ID for this row's change to a patient's reservation.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User Changed


Patient Discharged


Subtype Deleted


Discharge Undone


Encounter Canceled


Discharge Readmit

columns.name: RES_HX_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the reservation being changed that is associated with this contact. Multiple changes can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: RES_HX_RESRC_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the resource type record associated with this row's change to a patient's reservation.

columns.name: RES_HX_RESRC_SUBTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the type of stay associated with this row's change to a patient's reservation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RES_HX_START_DATE
columns.description: The date this reservation started at the instant this row's change took effect on the patient's reservation.

columns.name: RES_HX_START_TIME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The approximate start time category ID that was applicable at the instant of this row's change to a patient's reservation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Morning


Midday


Afternoon


Evening

columns.name: RES_HX_END_DATE
columns.description: The date this reservation ended at the instant this row's change took effect on the patient's reservation. If this is populated, then RES_HX_INDEF_YN will not be populated for this row.

columns.name: RES_HX_END_TIME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The approximate end time category ID that was applicable at the instant of this row's change to a patient's reservation. If this is populated, then RES_HX_INDEF_YN will not be populated for this row.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RES_HX_START_TIME_C_NAME

columns.name: RES_HX_INDEF_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this row's reservation was indefinite at the instant of this change. If Y, then RES_HX_END_DATE and RES_HX_END_TIME_C will not be populated for this row.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: RES_HX_CONFRMD_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this reservation was confirmed at the time of this change. Y indicates that this was scheduled and on the calendar.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RES_HX_INDEF_YN

columns.name: RES_HX_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when this row's change took effect.
